pkgmetadata.longdescription: A reporting pipeline for checking population pharmacokinetic model assumption // PKreport aims to 1) provide automatic pipeline for users to visualize data and models. It creates a flexible R framework with automatically generated R scripts to save time and cost for later usage; 2) implement an archive- oriented management tool for users to store, retrieve and modify figures. 3) offer powerful and convenient service to generate high-quality graphs based on two R packages: lattice and ggplot2.
